name: In Plain Sight (itch) (0zzie_0zzie)
description:
[Please comment any and all errors with the game, I will try to fix them all!]

-------------------------------------------

Warning: This game includes scary sounds, dark themes, and a LOT of jump scares!

Controls:

Down Arrow to close eyes

Space to shake bed

Use on screen arrows to change rooms.

----------------------------------------

You're a young child locked in your house with mysterious entities, threatening to attack you.

Stay in your room and fend them off until the end of the night.
